title: 'Our Thing' Season 4: Episode 2 "Kill This Fuc***g Bum"
description: Sammy gives us an inside description of the Ravenite Club and the role it played in the New York Mafia. He goes on to explain the rough relationship that Gotti had with the Lucchese's.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
